Detailed Description

Carries out paired erosion followed by dilation for denoising.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

00030         
00031         // read input
00032         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
